page.title: 19Business in The Tamar Valley
page.content: Two banks have sub branches in Gunnislake Village which are not open every day. Lloyds Bank opens on Thursdays from 10.00 a.m. to 12.30 p.m. and the National Westminster Bank opens on Tuesdays, Thursdays and Fridays from 10. 30 a.m to 12.30 p.m. There has been a lot of building recently in the area, especially of modern bungalows, and building sites are selling from Â£14 000. There are two estate agents in Gunnislake and properties for sale in the area range from Â£17 000 for a 2 bedroomed cottage to Â£95 000 for a 5 bedroomed house with 4 bathrooms. In Gunnislake there are two Building Society branches which are on the same premises as the estate agents. There are also a solicitor's office and a chartered accountant's office.
